title: Opeth - Morningrise 2000 reissue (WAV).zip
description:
Opeth&#039;s 2nd album "Morningrise" in WAV format straight from the CD. This is the 

reissued version released in 2000. It contains the bonus track "Eternal Soul 

Torture." The original version was released in 1996. Opeth&#039;s musical genre is most

often classified as "progressive death metal," although the band has many different 

influences, such as folk, jazz, and blues which can be heard in their music. Singer 

Mikael Ãƒâ€¦kerfeldt combines death growls and death metal style vocals with at times

very melodic singing. In my opinion, he is one of the best vocalists out there 

today.

I hope you will come to enjoy Opeth as much as I have. The lineup for this album is:

    * Mikael Ãƒâ€¦kerfeldt ? vocals, guitar, acoustic guitar
    * Peter Lindgren ? guitar, acoustic guitar
    * Johan DeFarfalla ? bass
    * Anders Nordin ? drums, percussion

Track listing is as follows:

   1. "Advent" ? 13:45
   2. "The Night and the Silent Water" ? 11:00
   3. "Nectar" ? 10:09
   4. "Black Rose Immortal" ? 20:14
   5. "To Bid You Farewell" ? 10:57
   6. "Eternal Soul Torture" ? 8:35

Enjoy this great album and seed for awhile, if you can.
